mapper.insert: insert into Board(boardno, placeID, ranking, review,id) values(tb_reply_seq.nextval,#{placeID}, #{ranking},#{review},#{id})
mapper.select: select b.placeID as placeID , b.ranking as ranking , b.review as review , b.reg_date as reg_date , m.nickname as nickname ,b.id as id from Board b, Member m where b.placeID= #{placeID} and m.id=b.id
